snippet: Student Opinion | Do you think it's possible to change your life through New Year's resolutions? Did you make any this year?
abstract: Student Opinion | Do you think it's possible to change your life through New Year's resolutions? Did you make any this year?
lead_paragraph: Happy New Year! Do you see the start of 2012 as an opportunity to improve your life? Have you made any changes or resolutions? Do you want to? If not, why not?

headline.main: Do You Make New Year's Resolutions?
